name: R5-MolecularSequence-R4-MolecularSequence
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MolecularSequence into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence`
R5 `MolecularSequence.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.contained`
R5 `MolecularSequence.device` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.device`

R5 `MolecularSequence.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MolecularSequence.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: What the molecular sequence is about, when it is not about the subject of record
Embedded file or a link (URL) which contains content to represent the sequence

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.id`

element.display: Unique ID for this particular sequence

target.display: Unique ID for this particular sequence. This is a FHIR-defined id
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.implicitRules`

R5 `MolecularSequence.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `MolecularSequence.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `MolecularSequence.literal` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.observedSeq`
R5 `MolecularSequence.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.meta`

R5 `MolecularSequence.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MolecularSequence.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Who should be responsible for test result

target.display: Who should be responsible for test result
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.performer`

element.display: A sequence defined relative to another sequence
Ways of identifying nucleotides or amino acids within a sequence

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.edit` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.variant`

target.display: End position of the variant on the reference sequence
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.edit.end` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.variant.end`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.edit.replacedSequence` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.variant.referenceAllele`
R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.edit.replacementSequence` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.variant.observedAllele`

element.display: Start position of the edit on the starting sequence
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Indicates the order in which the sequence should be considered when putting multiple 'relative' elements together
Indicates the nucleotide range in the composed sequence when multiple 'relative' elements are used together

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.startingSequence` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.referenceSeq`

R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.startingSequence.chromosome` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `MolecularSequence.referenceSeq.chromosome` - chromosome changed the binding strength from Required to Example; chromosome has change due to type change: R5 `chromosome` `CodeableConcept` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `chromosome`

element.display: The genome assembly used for starting sequence, e.g. GRCh38
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.startingSequence.orientation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.referenceSeq.orientation` - orientation has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/orientation-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/orientation-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

target.display: A string to represent reference sequence
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.startingSequence.sequence[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `MolecularSequence.referenceSeq.referenceSeqString` - referenceSeqString removed a binding requirement - Example ; referenceSeqString has change due to type change: R5 sequence[x] CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 referenceSeqString; referenceSeqString has change due to type change: R5 `sequence[x]` `string` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `referenceSeqString`; referenceSeqString has change due to type change: R5 sequence[x] Reference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 referenceSeqString

R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.startingSequence.strand` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.referenceSeq.strand` - strand has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/strand-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/strand-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

target.display: End position of the window on the reference sequence
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.startingSequence.windowEnd` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.referenceSeq.windowEnd`

target.display: Start position of the window on the  reference sequence
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.relative.startingSequence.windowStart` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.referenceSeq.windowStart`
R5 `MolecularSequence.specimen` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.specimen`

target.display: Who and/or what this is about
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.subject` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MolecularSequence.patient` - patient has change due to type change: R5 `subject` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `patient`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `MolecularSequence.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.text`

R5 `MolecularSequence.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MolecularSequence.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/sequence-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/sequence-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
